models.title: critica
models.description:
Critica is a platform where you can share your takes on the newest albums being released.

Available on the Apple App Store & the Google Play Store.

models.title: ihop
models.description:
ihop is a quadrupedal robot designed for stability and utility. Able to freely control all four limbs in pitch and yaw, it can serve as a mini-waiter, able to transport small objects.

Created for Robotics Studio at Columbia University
models.subtitle: the latest inventions from Muse
